Publication Title: Network Pharmacology Combined with Machine Learning to Reveal the Action Mechanism of Licochalcone Intervention in Liver Cancer
Relevance to DruGNNosis-MoA Model: Too specific, focusing on liver-related drugs. The study does not explicitly categorize the mechanisms of action of licochalcones as either palliative or etiological. Instead, it focuses on elucidating the specific molecular interactions and pathways through which these compounds influence cancer cell behavior. Therefore, a comparison between this study and DruGNNosis-MoA, which aims to classify drug mechanisms into palliative or etiological categories, is not applicable.

Model Name/Type:
To broaden our search, we conducted a comprehensive analysis of all 933 abstracts from papers that cited the two most relevant papers indicated as YES in column H for comparison with our model. 
If an abstract appeared relevant to our research, we proceeded with a full-text review to assess its applicability.
